briefTitle: Study Comparing the Safety and Efficacy of IDP-120 Gel and IDP-120 Vehicle Gel in the Treatment of Acne Vulgaris
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Multi-Center, Randomized, Double-Blind, Vehicle-Controlled, 2 Arm, Parallel Group Study Comparing the Safety and Efficacy of IDP-120 Gel and IDP-120 Vehicle Gel in the Treatment of Acne Vulgaris
summary: study designed to assess the safety, tolerability, and efficacy of IDP-120 Gel and IDP-120 Vehicle Gel

primaryOutcome.measure: Absolute Change in Mean Lesion Counts at Week 12
